about_the_game:
Take charge of the Polaris Mk 0 and repair your damaged ship, learn from your crewmates, and discover the true nature of what lies beyond existence… before you do it all over again.

Follow the core tenants of the Sectorian Collective as you:


Seek Knowledge

Each loop in the game will offer you new insights into how to efficiently rectify the Polaris Mk 0’s many misfortunes whilst traveling through the Marion. Along the way, you’ll pick up tools that persist through your runs and aid you in your quest to save your crewmates.

Solve Problems

As you breach the Marion, your crew’s situation becomes more dangerous. It’s your job to fix mechanical failures and keep everyone alive! You’ll need to solve puzzling crises, assist your crewmates, and reach the bridge in time to save your ship.

Always Put the Crew First

Meet a colorful cast of aliens from all over the universe whom you get to call your crewmates. You’ll help each other as you make choices that will affect the success of the mission and your survival.

Join us… Beyond the Marion!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: Ryzen5 or Intel Equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Sound Card

short_description: A 3D First Person walking simulator and puzzle game. You will interact with your alien crewmates and repair your spaceship in order to escape a time loop. Explore space in a ship straight from the 70’s, and meet your companions - brought to life with a funky claymated style!
